ahead.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a short distance in front of someone or something
ahead.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He kept his gaze fixed on the car ahead.
We could see the lights of Las Vegas up ahead.
Henry hurried on ahead  (=went in front of the others).
The clinic was now in sight, some way ahead.
The river is eight miles away dead ahead.
A hill loomed ahead of them.
ahead.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: if someone or something looks or moves ahead, they look or move forward
ahead.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The ship forged ahead through the thin ice.
ahead.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: There were four people ahead of me at the doctor’s.
ahead.translation[0].definitions[3].exam: Unless we plan ahead (=plan for the future) we are going to be in a mess.
We do not foresee any major changes in the years ahead.
You have a long trip ahead of you.
ahead.translation[0].definitions[4].exam: I cook rice two or three hours ahead.
Can you tell me ahead of time if you’re coming?
He’s giving a series of concerts in London ahead of his international tour.
ahead.translation[0].definitions[5].defi: making progress and being successful in your job, education etc
ahead.translation[0].definitions[5].exam: Getting ahead at work is the most important thing to her at the moment.
ahead.translation[0].definitions[6].defi: ideas, achievements etc that are ahead of others have made more progress or are more developed
ahead.translation[0].definitions[6].exam: This design is light years ahead (=much more advanced) in performance and comfort.
Coleridge was in many ways far ahead of his time.
ahead.translation[0].definitions[7].defi: winning in a competition or election
ahead.translation[0].definitions[7].exam: Two shots from Gardner put the Giants 80–75 ahead.
We are 10 points ahead in the polls.
At this stage, Smith appeared to be ahead of his rivals.
ahead.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: if the value of something is ahead of a previous level, it has increased
ahead.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The shares were ahead more than 11% at one stage, and closed 85 up at 944p.
